Ski Japan Hakuba - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Ski Japan Hukuba Hakuba, set in the heart of the stunning Japanese Alps, is a must-visit for skiers and snowboarders seeking world-class winter thrills. Known for its incredible snowfall and breathtaking alpine vistas, Hakuba delivers the kind of powder conditions that winter sports lovers dream of. Just a quick three-hour bullet train ride from Tokyo, Hakuba Valley is home to 10 diverse ski resorts, offering an impressive network of 138 lifts and 5 gondolas. Mid-week, the slopes are often uncrowded, giving you the chance to carve out fresh tracks for days. From the expansive terrain at Happo-One to beginner-friendly runs, there's something for every level of skier or snowboarder. Off the slopes, Hakuba's welcoming village offers everything from local dining and boutique shopping to vibrant nightlife, making it more than just a ski destination—it's a full winter escape. With a blend of thrilling alpine adventure and cosy village charm, Hakuba offers an unforgettable experience in Japan’s snowy paradise.
